name: European Young Engineers
memberOrga: A list of EYE's members organisations can be found at http://e-y-e.eu/wordpress/members/
goal: European Young Engineers (EYE) aspires to be the leading platform to reach young Engineers within the European community. EYE will provide young people with the skills, connections and cultural awareness to build a successful career in Engineering, whether in their own country or internationally.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Mobility of Engineers, Recognition of professional qualifications, Digital Transformation, European labour market
